message:
Being trafficked while at home is more common than people realize.
"At the height of selling herself for sex, Shelley would take the bus to school and attend her first-period class. She would then hop in an Uber and head to a nearby hotel."

data.description: Peel Regional Police officer Const. Joy Brown, who chairs the Peel Human Trafficking Service Providers Committee, said the average age for “entrenched” girls in commercial sexual exploitation is 17...
data.title: 'He never blew his cover that he was in love with me’: How a Caledon teen was lured into sex trafficking
